fields.name: Opti Neoprene Dumbbell Set - 2 x 5kg
fields.description: Perfect for beginners to the world of fitness. These weights are great for conditioning your whole body so you can sculpt your arms, shoulders, back and legs as you can perform a range of exercises with them. These dumbbells are small and easily stackable thanks to their hex shape, making them the perfect start to a home gym equipment collection. The inside is made of cast iron with a strong neoprene coat meaning you get a weight with a snug grip making your full body workout more comfortable.

fields.name: Opti Dumbbell Tree Set
fields.description: Make the perfect start to your fitness journey with this dumbbell and stand set. Ideal for beginners, the dumbbell tree holds three pairs of dumbbells weighing 1.1kg, 2.3kg and 4.5kg respectively. Train your whole body building your strength and conditioning at your own pace and then easily store the weights on the tree when you're done.

fields.name: Opti Cast Iron Dumbbell Set - 20kg
fields.description: Give your home workout a professional look with this Opti Cast Iron Dumbbell set. These dumbbells are perfect for a whole-body workout and can help you achieve whatever fitness goals you have, without leaving the house. Work your upper body and add some extra resistance to your lower body workouts. The cast iron design is built to last and the rubber grips give you a more comfortable workout.

fields.name: Opti Neoprene 6kg Dumbbells
fields.description: Perform a combination of bicep and hammer curls with tricep extensions to work on your upper arms and lateral, side and rear raises with shoulder presses to build stronger shoulders. You can also perform a range of leg exercises by adding weight to lunges or squats to increase your strength and enhance your balance.

fields.name: Opti Vinyl Dumbbell Case Set - 6kg
fields.description: Take the first step on your fitness journey with this set of vinyl dumbbells. It gives you a pair of 0.5kg, 1kg and 1.5kg weights that you can use as part of a full body workout. Tone and sculpt your arms, back, chest, shoulders and legs or just increase the intensity of your aerobic workout. Whatever you want to do, your fitness journey starts here.

fields.name: Opti Cast Iron Dumbbell Set - 15kg
fields.description: Give your home workout a professional look with this Opti Cast Iron Dumbbell set. These dumbbells are perfect for a whole body workout and can help you achieve whatever fitness goals you have, without leaving the house. Work your upper body and add some extra resistance to your lower body workouts. The cast iron design is built to last and the rubber grips give you a more comfortable workout.

fields.name: Opti Vinyl Dumbbell Set - 20kg
fields.description: Help to strengthen and tone your whole body with this vinyl set of dumbbells. Whether you're looking to gain muscle or lose fat these dumbbells can help you on your exercise journey. The spinlock grips make it easy for you to add or remove weights as you progress. You can add as little as 1.25kg at a time - making progression happen at your pace. The vinyl plates are matched with a rubber grip for a smooth, comfortable workout and the plates can be removed and easily stacked when you're done.

fields.name: Opti Vinyl Dumbbell Set - 15kg
fields.description: Help to strengthen and tone your whole body with this cast iron set of dumbbells. Whether you're looking to gain muscle or lose fat these dumbbells can help you in your exercise journey. The spinlock grips make it easy for you to add or remove weights as you progress. You can add as little as 1.25kg at a time - making progression happen at your pace. The vinyl plates are matched with a rubber grip for a smooth, comfortable workout and the plates can be removed and easily stacked when you're done.

fields.name: Opti Vinyl Kettlebells Orange - 10kg
fields.description: Grab hold of your exercise routine and take control with this 10kg kettlebell. It's comfortable to hold thanks to the vinyl handle and body, meaning you can get on with strengthening and toning your muscles. They also help improve your endurance, cardio stamina and promote healthy weight loss.

fields.name: Opti Vinyl Kettlebells 8kg - Blue
fields.description: Stafford Big & Tall ribbed athletic t-shirts deliver the tagless comfort and breathable performance he needs.  super soft, quick-drying, durable fabric preshrunk for lasting fit reinforced durable stitching tag free cotton/polyester washable imported

fields.name: Opti Vinyl Kettlebell 6kg - Purple
fields.description: Get into the swing of exercising with this 6kg kettlebell. With a vinyl handle and body it's ideal for strengthening and toning muscles, improving endurance, boosting cardio stamina and promoting healthy weight loss.

fields.name: Opti Vinyl 4kg Kettlebells - Pink
fields.description: Perfect for beginners, this 4kg kettlebell will help you get into the swing of things. It's vinyl handle and body are easy to hold as you strengthen and tone your muscles. They will help you improving your endurance, boost cardio stamina and promote healthy weight loss.

fields.name: Opti Vinyl 2kg Kettlebells - Red
fields.description: Get started on your swinging adventure with this 2kg kettlebell. It's vinyl handle and body are easy to hold as you strengthen and tone your muscles. They will help you improve your endurance, boost cardio stamina and promote healthy weight loss.

fields.name: Opti Wrist and Ankle Weights - 2 x 0.5kg
fields.description: Add a little extra to your workout with these wrist and ankle weights. Burn more calories by adding resistance to your workouts and combining cardio and weight training. The adjustable hook and loop straps can be altered for the perfect size, making them comfortable for you to wear during running, fitness exercises, cardio, cycling, hiking and other sports.

fields.name: Opti 5kg Weighted Vest
fields.description: Perfect for adding an extra element to your strength and cross fit training, this weighted vest will help you increase the intensity and efficiency of your workout. The front and back weights are evenly distributed to support your optimum performance, and you can easily remove the weights to adjust your resistance level. One size fits most and the waist is Velcro to give you safety and protection while you use it.
